snippet.title: Hero of Sparta - Cinematic trailer by Gameloft
snippet.description:
Now available on the App Store: http://itunes.apple.com/app/hero-of-sparta/id299093633?mt=8

The exclusive 3D cinematic trailer of the top action game on iPhone and mobile! It's your chance to write your own legend... if you can survive this colossal odyssey. Be prepared for hours of gaming and visual enjoyment, and fight the most phenomenal mythical creatures in majectic 3D environments.

Now available on the App Store: http://itunes.com/apps/heroofsparta

Follow us on twitter and be the first to know about exclusive news and more! https://twitter.com/HeroofSparta

Official site: http://www.gameloft.com
Friend us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Gameloft
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/Gameloft
Visit our blog: http://blog.gameloft.com
